languages.text: Whenever the wielder performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}时，会获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，6点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，以及{uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367}点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 当装备者发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}时，会获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，6点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，以及<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или прибегая к {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянным мерам{/g}, персонаж получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или прибегая к {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянным мерам{/g}, персонаж получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или прибегая к {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянным мерам{/g}, персонаж получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を取るたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+2、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+6、{uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367}分の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を取るたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を2、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を6、<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>分の一時的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を得る。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を取るたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を2、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を6、{uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367}分の一時的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o una {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}, consigue +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, y {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o una {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}, consigue +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, y <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g})</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} ausführt, erhält er +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} ou à une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g}, il bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi; {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
